p: All this makes zein has been widely used in the food industry as a coating material [ 39]. In this regard, there are some studies about the electrospinning of zein in the food science, especially by inclusion functional compounds inside them. Dai et al. [ 65] investigated the formation mechanism, structural characterization and stability of curcumin in zein-lecithin composite NPs formed by antisolvent coprecipitation. Authors stated that these NPs could be a potential carrier for water-insoluble bioactive components with enhanced EE (99.83%) and chemical stability.
